participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Confident and creative, enjoys expressing himself through unique hobbies.
participant_1.background: I drove my Mercedes through the Arizona desert. my mom is a nurse. i love to crochet. My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries. I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, with a passion for exploring new cultures and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: I have a family who works in the retail industry, so I often get discounts on my favorite clothes. i like going to foreign countries. i love to crochet. I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music. My social media presence is mostly for my job search, but I do enjoy interacting with friends and family online.

content.text: I like to crochet. Do you?
Yes, I love it! I crochet so much that my family works in the retail industry so I can get discounts on my favorite clothes.
That's so cool! I drive a Mercedes through the Arizona desert, what do you do?
I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music. I also like going to foreign countries.
That's awesome! I'm a bit older than you and I love to cook designer French fries. My family is supportive and encouraging of this.
That's so cool! I like to interact with friends and family online, but my social media presence is mostly for my job search.
That's good! I would like to spend more time with my family.
I would too. I'm glad we have something in common.
